artist: Artist: Kitagawa Utamaro; Publisher: Tsutaya Jūzaburō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: unsigned double page from an illustrated poem book
inscription:
right: {Kaki okuru / Fumi mo toguro wo / Makigami ni / Tsumoru omoi no / Take wa nagamushi / Chida Hanamoto} (I am sending you a long, wistful letter / Written on paper / Rolled up like a coiled snake. / My pent-up passion, / Is as deep as a snake is long / by Chida Hanamoto)
left: {Kirawaruru / Urami ya iro mo / Ao-tokage / Kuzuha naranedo / Hai matouran / Tonya Sakafune} (Because I am so disliked, / My grudge against you, my love, / Has turned me into green lizard / Which crawls around / The Leaves of arrowroot vine / by Tonya Sakafune)
medium: Woodblock printed book page; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Picture Book of Selected Insects (Ehon mushi erami 画本虫撰)
title: Skink and Rat Snake
